definition: to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore
large place used for a specific purpose/stage/scene (of a play)/classifier for sporting or recreational activities/classifier for number of exams
threshing floor/classifier for events and happenings: spell, episode, bout
to put to good use/to come in handy

sentences.english: Once the tire failure, accompanied the spare tire will come in handy.
sentences.chinese: 一旦輪胎髮生故障，隨車攜帶的備胎就可派上用場。

sentences.english: The languages I learned in the Army came in handy.
sentences.chinese: 我在部隊當兵時學到的語言派上了用場。

sentences.english: Wait a minute, what did I do with the other one?
sentences.chinese: 等等，另一個東西我派啥用場啦？

sentences.english: This is a nifty feature that can come in handy for avid users.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個對於熱心用戶可以派上用場的精巧功能。

sentences.english: This photo would later find its way into the 2008 presidential campaign.
sentences.chinese: 這張照片在2008年大選中派上了用場。

sentences.english: The portable system for quick diagnosis can be deployed during outbreaks to keep them from becoming pandemics.
sentences.chinese: 該系統能在疫情爆發時派上用場，防止疾病流行。

sentences.english: Mushroom stone and slate could be both used.
sentences.chinese: 此種裝修，“蘑菇石”和“板岩”都能派上用場。

sentences.english: It can work for snow, too.
sentences.chinese: 在玩雪時它也能派上用場。

sentences.english: There are instances where a professor recommendation could be useful.
sentences.chinese: 這裏有些例子能夠數模教授的推薦信能派上用場。

sentences.english: This abstemiousness has served it well as the commodity cycle has turned.
sentences.chinese: 這些節餘在商品週期由盛轉衰的時候大派用場。

sentences.english: Every single bit allowed by the laws of thermodynamics is put to use.
sentences.chinese: 每一個被熱力學定律所允許的位元，都派上用場。

sentences.english: The third area where analytical frameworks come in handy is in training.
sentences.chinese: 分析框架可派上用場的第三種情況是在培訓中。

sentences.english: The Web Developer Tool will also come in handy on this website.
sentences.chinese: 這個網站的網站開發工具遲早也會派上用場。

sentences.english: The French he learnt in high school came in handy when he was in the army.
sentences.chinese: 他高中時學的法語在部隊服役時派上了用場。

sentences.english: "I hope that this will eventually find its way into clinical reality," says Lelkes.
sentences.chinese: 我希望這項技術最終能在臨牀實踐中派上用場。

sentences.english: Be sure the glue gun is warmed up and that you have a glue stick or two handy.
sentences.chinese: 可以肯定的膠槍是熱身和您有一個膠棒或兩個用場。
